document.full_text: the tennessee valley authority has restored to service 14 high-voltage transmission lines knocked out by the severe storms and tornadoes that devastated large tracts of the u.s. southeast on wednesday.
document.title: tva says 120 grid structures damaged by storm
lines_and_colors: the tennessee valley authority has restored to service 14 high-voltage transmission lines knocked out by the severe storms and tornadoes that devastated large tracts of the u.s. southeast on wednesday.
